transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello. Ji good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ji, meri baat Hussain sir se ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji Hussain sir Ashraf baat kar raha hu IndiaMART ke head office se. Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Ji thik hai sir.
Executive: Ji ji aapki call aayi thi na actually mein customer care mein Sunday mein but koi available nahi tha call pick karne ke liye.
Customer: Ha ha ha. Wo kya hai ke mujhe jo review, jo mera jo mujhe review dena hai na, review dete hai na jisse.
Executive: Ha ha ha, jisse kisi buyer se review lete hain.
Customer: Ha ha, to meri kya buyer se kya maine unse kaam kiya to wo mujhe review dene ki bol rahe the.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Customer: To unhone wo kya hai link maangi hai review wali link maangi hai meri.
Executive: Achha achha to main aapko batata hu sir aap kaise use karte hain IndiaMART laptop se, desktop se ya phone se?
Customer: Phone se sir, phone se karta hu.
Executive: Phone se karte hain sir ek baar speaker pe kar lo aap phone.
Customer: Ek second sir. Ha ji.
Executive: Ji thik hai?
Customer: Ha, speaker pe kar liya aapne. Ab karna ye hai sir IndiaMART open karna hai aapko.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Ji thik hai. Ek second.
Executive: Usme ha thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji. Open kar liya hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai usme wo naam aap dhundiye zara jinse aapne deal kari hai.
Customer: Maine jinse deal kari hai wo naam ek second. Ha.

Customer: Ha ji mil gaya.
Executive: Mil gaya sir? Ab isi mein aapko sabse niche jana hai sir. Unke niche na ek option aa raha hoga ask for review ka. Dekhiye.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Dekhiye dekhiye jaha pe likha hua catalog link share karne ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ha ha ji ji ji.
Executive: Usi mein search kariye thoda sa aage mein na ask for review ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Usi mein share.
Executive: Usi mein thoda sa right aur left scroll kariye matlab upar niche nahi right aur left matlab aur bhi aage.
Customer: Ask for review, ask for review.
Executive: Ji ji correct correct bilkul sahi sir kehna sir yahi wala hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To ab main aapko ek cheez aur batana chahunga yaha pe ask for review ka option dekho sir hamesha nahi aa raha hota hai pata hai kya jaise maan lo aaj koi customer ki lead aapne uthai to same time mein ask for review nahi aayega. Agar maan lijiye aap aur buyer ke beech mein conversation hua matlab aapne bhi message kiya aur uska bhi message aaya to ask for review ka option open ho jata hai ya fir ya to wo lead ya enquiry teen din purani ho gayi ho. Thik hai tab ask for review ka option aayega maan lijiye usne reply hi nahi kiya fir bhi teen din purani ho gayi hai lead ya enquiry tab ask for review ka option aane lagta hai. Thik hai? Achha Hussain sir abhi kaisa kaam waam chal raha hai waise IndiaMART ke through jaise chaar mahine ya paanch mahine aapko IndiaMART pe ho gaya hai to kuch business aa raha hai? Matlab is customer ko chhod ke puch raha hu ye to chalo aapne banaya customer achha kiya.
Customer: Uske baad mein bhi thoda bahut aaya lekin itna khaas nahi aaya hai.
Executive: Achha achha to main ek cheez aur jaanna chahunga ab hamare paas to product ki jo hai na bahut sare products aise hain jinki aap lead to purchase kar rahe ho but wo as a product nahi hai add jaise ki indoor water fountain, fountain waterfall, hai na decorative fountain, water fountain, garden fountain. Thik hai ye sab categories hain stone fountain ab dekho in sabki lead aap lete ho hai na FRP fountain mujhe lagta hai fountain bahut tariko ke banate ho bas ye hai ki unko as a product aapne add nahi kiya hai bas aapne na indoor fountain aur marble pillar ko add kar rakha hai. To mere hisab se to aapko na in sare products ko main ya to kahiye to main add kar deta hu as a product karna aapko ye hoga ki photo aur matlab price aur details deni hongi usme.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Product aapko added mil jayega profile mein apne. Sahi rahega na?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Fir I think zyada better rahega aapke liye. Achha ab rating and reviews to aapka achha hai call picking rate bhi main dekh pa raha hu achha hai lead.
Customer: To ye mujhe unko WhatsApp pe WhatsApp pe share karna hai ye?
Executive: Nahi nahi dekhiye main samjhata hu main samjhata hu aapko ask for review pe jab aapne click kar diya na sir to ye buyer ke jo mail ID hai na uspe chala gaya hai unke paas link.
Customer: Achha mail unki mail ID pe chal gaya hai?
Executive: Ha ha aur unke message mein bhi gaya hoga unka jo mobile number hai na usme message mein bhi gaya hoga.
Customer: Okay ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai ab main ek kaam karunga sir abhi aapko pehle to main aapko apna number bhejunga to kya aap dekho IndiaMART mein aap customer care pe call karna pad raha hai aap jaan bhi nahi pa rahe ho kaun handle kar raha hai mera account hai na to pehle main aapko message karunga WhatsApp pe wo number aap IndiaMART karke save kar lena Ashraf IndiaMART. Thik hai Hussain sir aur further koi query concern hoga to aap mujhe waha pe puch lena maan lo wo ask for review aapne bheja usko nahi mila to aap mujhko WhatsApp mein bhi puch sakte ho ek baar hai na fir waha pe screenshot mujhe bhej dena koi dikkat aa rahi hai ki sir aisa aisa hai nahi dikh raha hai ya dikh raha hai to mujhe screenshot bhej sakte ho aap. Thik hai to overall abhi jaise aapka ye feedback kyuki kal to koi attend nahi kiya tha aaj maine ispe resolution aapko de diya hai to main abhi feedback close karunga to ek feedback aayega sir mere liye hai na Ashraf ke liye to usko please aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Main abhi aapko hello kar de raha hu WhatsApp pe apne number se.
Customer: Okay sir. Okay Hussain sir thank you sir have a nice day.
Executive: Thank you sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed review link for buyer.

- Customer said business is not good.



Resolution:

- Executive provided review link process.

- Executive offered to add more product categories.

- Executive shared his WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark feedback as satisfied.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- review, buyleads, products, whatsapp
